job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.description: ltpgtwe are seeking a senior data engineer to help us build our highly programmable and scalable data pipelines from the ground up using public cloud infrastructure and services your position requires handson development and data schema modeling while collaborating closely with the team in driving the critical technical decisions and infrastructure needed to launch support and ramp the product in a fastpaced environment you are a thinkerdoer who can think broadly still deep dive into details align with product management on requirements and priorities towards producing a bestinclass product experience and help shape the team cultureltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltugtrecommended skillsltspan classqlcursorgtltspangtltugtltpgtltulgtltligtextensive background in cs or equivalent experienceltligtltligta deep understanding of cloud data warehouseslakes relational databases distributed systems massively parallel processing mpp databases and nosql databasesampnbspltligtltligtexperience developing and optimizing largescale batch and realtime data pipelinesltligtltligtable to build robust reliable and scalable data infrastructureltligtltligtdemonstrated ability to architect and implement data pipelines and data modelsltligtltligtan analytics mindset to analyze large data sets to identify gaps and inconsistencies provide data insights and advance effective product solutionsltligtltligtexperience performing in etl with a combination of sql and pythonampnbspltligtltligtshipped products and worked across teamsltligtltligtexcellent communication skills both written and verballtligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltugtbenefitsltugtltpgtltulgtltligtmacbook airproltligtltligtvision dental and medical plan choicesltligtltligtflexible working hoursltligtltligtcompetitive salary ampamp kltligtltligtflexiblepersonal time offltligtltligtemployee stock purchase plans and other financial benefitsltligtltligtpaid holidaysltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
